item.title: Singapore Airlines
item.description: Singapore Airlines Limited (SIA) is the flag carrier airline of Singapore with its hub at Singapore Changi Airport. The airline uses the Singapore Girl as its central figure in corporate branding. It is ranked as the world’s best airline, since 2018, while winning the top spot in three other categories in the same year including “Best First Class”, “Best First Class Airline Seat”, and “Best Airline in Asia”. In 2018, the airline was placed 18th on the top 50 most admired companies worldwide, first in Asia and the only airline on the list.
